name: Couple of Minutes - Striker
description:
This game has been developed for the 10th birthday of my son Flavio.

Among the stuff Flavio loves, I can enumerate:

  • Ninjas
  • Football
  • Fighting

So I decided to dedicate him a simple game  based on the theme "Football"

"Couple of Minutes" game means you can play the game anywhere (at bus stop, in the bathroom, etc. :-)) without thinking too much...just a couple of minutes break from other commitments
